page.title: 19POP CHARTS IN JUNE 1985
page.content:
Number 1:{You'll Never Walk Alone}by The Crowd. This song was re-released in aid of the Bradford City fire disaster. Number 2:{Kayleigh}by Marillion. Number 3:{Obsession}by Animotion. Number 4:{19}by Paul Hardcastle. This song is about the Vietnam war. Number 5:{Out in the Fields}by Phil Lynott and Gary Moore. Number 6:{A View to Kill}by Duran Duran. Theme from new James Bond film. Number 7:{The Word Girl}by Scritti Politti. Number 8:{Walking on Sunshine}by Katrina and the Waves. Number 9:{Crazy for You}by Madonna. Number 10:{Call Me}by Go West.
{by Sheila Festou
